solution_line_template: Jerry will spend {games_per_daughter} games x {hours_per_game} hours per game = <<{games_per_daughter}*{hours_per_game}={play_hours_one}>>{play_hours_one} hours watching one daughter play her games.
He will spend {play_hours_one} x {num_daughters} = <<{play_hours_one}*{num_daughters}={play_hours_both}>>{play_hours_both} hours watching both daughters play their games.

He will spend {games_per_daughter} games x {hours_practice_per_game} hours of practice = <<{games_per_daughter}*{hours_practice_per_game}={practice_hours_one}>>{practice_hours_one} hours watching one daughter practice.
He will spend {practice_hours_one} x {num_daughters} = <<{practice_hours_one}*{num_daughters}={practice_hours_both}>>{practice_hours_both} hours watching both daughters practice.
He will spend a total of {play_hours_both} hours watching games + {practice_hours_both} hours watching practice = <<{play_hours_both}+{practice_hours_both}={total_hours}>>{total_hours} hours.
